trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bellingham
There were no other sightings in Bellingham on or around June 14th 2012
Summary: Slow moving object, no sound, moving in a Southern direction, sons saw the object first.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy sons saw the object first while outside smoking a cigarette on the deck and called me out to see it, and observed no sound coming from object, quickly grabbed the digital camera, tried to take a picture, and the camera wouldn't show the image on it. Took another and another as the object moved away, picking up some speed. Downloaded the pictures onto the desktop and found only one picture came out clear enough to see (a cigar shaped object) When you first look at the dark night sky, you don't see anything. But scroll into the picture making it larger and it looks like a bright white cigar object.
